Description: Copper alloy weight, discoidal with double-grooved convex profile; lathe-turned with rim on face only; face engraved with single herring-bone wreath enclosing cross above denominational mark; engraved circle partly round edge of base; file marks on base.
Bibliographic references: Entwistle 2008 / A Catalogue of the Late Roman and Byzantine Weights and Weighing Equipment in the British Museum (270)
